summary:
Finally!!!! a Skyrim Friendly white robes, white hood and white boots!!
All items come in 2 versions, Wizard and normal clothing.
descriptionHtml:
I never could find a normal white wizard outfit. or clothing. like monk clothes.. but in white....

so i made it.

the Hood is not attached to the Robes. (better like this i think)

2 versions :   Wizard and Normal.

The difference is that the Wizard outfit is more expensive and it has armor rating.

All the gear can be found on the entrance to high Hrothgar
author: Ian Joseph
